messages.subject: Re: Re:  Questions
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/7/2003 10:32:00 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: I would be less than thrilled if I had just
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/7/2003 10:32:00 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

I would be less than thrilled if I had just expressed blatant frustration and
my husband put on the "you little schnookums" voice and said "I hear that
you're frustrated..."
*****************************
A long, long time ago (in a faraway universe), my then-husband (Julian's dad)
and I were both working in a day care center. We knew we were in trouble
when, while having a fight, one or the other of us would say, "That's not okay!"

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
